data.author: mosfet80
data.message:
Merge pull request #11 from mosfet80/patch-1

fix cmake deprecation

data.author: Chris Lalancette
data.message:
Don't automatically enable verbose makefiles. (#9)

That is a decision that the user should make with
their MAKEFLAGS.

Signed-off-by: Chris Lalancette <clalancette@gmail.com>

data.author: Scott K Logan
data.message:
Switch to ament_cmake_ros_core package (#8)

Signed-off-by: Scott K Logan <logans@cottsay.net>

data.author: Miguel Company
data.message:
Changes to build against Fast DDS 3.0 (#5)

* Support for `Fast DDS 3.0`

* Do not require cmake modules.

* Remove dependency on fastrtps_cmake_module.

* Fix dll linkage and keep header guards.

* Fix windows warnings

Signed-off-by: Mario Dominguez <mariodominguez@eprosima.com>
Signed-off-by: Ricardo Gonz√°lez <ricardo@richiware.dev>
Signed-off-by: Miguel Company <miguelcompany@eprosima.com>
Co-authored-by: Chris Lalancette <clalancette@gmail.com>

data.author: Chris Lalancette
data.message:
Drop support for long double/float128. (#6)

Signed-off-by: Chris Lalancette <clalancette@gmail.com>

data.author: Chris Lalancette
data.message:
Remove more unnecessary semicolons. (#4)

This fixes warnings when building with GCC 9.

Signed-off-by: Chris Lalancette <clalancette@gmail.com>

data.author: methylDragon
data.message:
Merge pull request #3 from ros2/runtime_interface_reflection_allocators

Dynamic Subscription (BONUS: Allocators): rosidl_dynamic_typesupport_fastrtps

data.message:
Check if allocator is valid

data.author: methylDragon
data.message:
Refactor dynamic type support structs to use allocators and refs

data.author: methylDragon
data.message:
Refactor serialization support to use allocators and refs

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

data.author: Chris Lalancette
data.message:
Remove unnecessary semicolons.

In particular, these macros are all defining functions, so
no semicolons needed on the end.  This fixes warnings
when compiling with gcc 9.4.0

Signed-off-by: Chris Lalancette <clalancette@gmail.com>

data.author: methylDragon
data.message:
Runtime Interface Reflection: rosidl_dynamic_typesupport_fastrtps (#1)

* Initial implementation

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Implement dynamic data serialize and deserialize

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Migrate to rosidl type description

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Fix const and memory issues

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Move type and type builder init from description to parent library

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Add name getters

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Update names

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Reorder ID arg

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Add support for bounded strings

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Update complex value insertion

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Beautify

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Handle wstring

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Reintroduce type construction with delimiter replacements

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Add visibility macros

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Only use general type construction and implement default values

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Beautify

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Use allocators for memory management

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Add fixed string support

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* wip Use return types

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Fix C linkage

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Migrate all void methods to use return types

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Migrate remaining methods to use return types

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Lint

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Fix windows build

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Move dynamic type support struct to rosidl and fix mem issues

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Add uchar header and fix sequence bound constructor call

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Use create instead of init

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Fix windows warnings

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Remove print functions

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>

* Fix xutility warning

Signed-off-by: methylDragon <methylDragon@gmail.com>
